#labels Featured,jedit
The mini-project also hosts various [http://jedit.org/ JEdit] macros.

= Introduction =

The macros are not published in download location. They may be downloaded from svn trunk.


= Details =

|| *Macro* || *Description* ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/wiztools/source/browse/jedit-macros/trunk/encodeForXML.bsh Encode for XML]  || Transforms special XML characters *`<`*, *`>`*, *"*, *'* and *&* to *&lt;*, *&gt;*, *&quot;*, *&apos;* and *&amp;* respectively ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/wiztools/source/browse/jedit-macros/trunk/HTML5Template.bsh HTML5 Template] || Creates a new buffer with HTML5 standard template ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/wiztools/source/browse/jedit-macros/trunk/JavafyString.bsh Javafy String] || Assign selected text to a Java String variable ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/wiztools/source/browse/jedit-macros/trunk/MakeSingleLineCode.bsh Make Single Line Code] || Compacts C-derived language code into single-line. Can be used to compact CSS too. ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/wiztools/source/browse/jedit-macros/trunk/HTMLSplCharPunctuationConvert.bsh HTML special characters n intelligent punctuation char conversion] || Converts intelligently! ||
